trans-unit.source: Provides access to the property values of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern" /> object using its <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.Current" /> or <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.Cached" /> accessors.
trans-unit.target: Proporciona acceso a los valores de propiedades de un objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern" /> mediante sus descriptores de acceso <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.Current" /> o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.Cached" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the value of a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor que especifica si el valor de un elemento [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] es de solo lectura.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the value is read-only; <see langword="false" /> if it can be modified.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si el valor es de solo lectura; <see langword="false" /> si se puede modificar.

trans-unit.source: A control should have its <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.IsEnabledProperty> set to `true` and its <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.IsReadOnlyProperty> set to `false` before the client attempts a call to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.SetValue%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Un control debe tener su <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.IsEnabledProperty> establecido en `true` y su <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.IsReadOnlyProperty> establecido en `false` antes de que el cliente intenta realizar una llamada a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.SetValue%2A>.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> that supports the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern> control pattern has its <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.ValueProperty> set to a user-specified value.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente, un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> que admita la <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern> patrón de control tiene su <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.ValueProperty> establecido en un valor especificado por el usuario.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element.
The value of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element as a string.
trans-unit.target: El valor de la [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elemento como una cadena.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es una cadena vacía.

trans-unit.source: Single-line edit controls support programmatic access to their contents through <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern>.
trans-unit.target: Controles de edición de línea única admiten el acceso mediante programación a su contenido a través de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern>.

trans-unit.source: However, multi-line edit controls do not support the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern> control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Sin embargo, los controles de edición multilínea no admiten el <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern> patrón de control.

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the textual contents of multi-line edit controls the controls must support the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern> control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Para recuperar el contenido textual de varias líneas los controles deben admitir los controles de edición la <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern> patrón de control.

trans-unit.source: However, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern> does not support setting the value of a control.
trans-unit.target: Sin embargo, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern> no admite establecer el valor de un control.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern> does not support the retrieval of formatting information or substring values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern> no se admite la recuperación de información de formato ni valores de subcadena.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern> control pattern must be used in these scenarios.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern> patrón de control debe usarse en estos escenarios.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern> object obtained from a target control is passed into a function that retrieves the current <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern> property values.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente, un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern> objeto obtenido de un control de destino se pasa a una función que recupera actual <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern> valores de propiedad.
